mapper.select: select u.id , u.user_name , u."password" , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , a."name" as "authority_name" , a.id as "authority_id" from user_ u inner join users_authorities ua on ua.user_id = u.id inner join authority a on a.id = ua.authority_id where u.user_name = #{username}

SELECT id as "id" , user_name as "userName" , count as "co unt" , date as "date" , status as "status" , message as "message" , islocked as "islocked" FROM user_lock_count Where user_name = #{userName} AND islocked = #{isLocked};
mapper.update: UPDATE user_ SET last_login_date = to_char(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , last_login_time = to_char(NOW(), 'HH12MISS') WHERE user_name = #{userName}
